name: Gold Mine & Debt Relief
description:
You attempted to pay your rent with a night of poker at the tavern, and surprise, surprise, you lost it all. Now you are knee-deep in debt. Your last resort is to take up adventuring, and loot an abandoned mine…

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim & Shoot

R - Reload

E- mine blocks

To mine blocks you have to be right next to them and see an outline. To change levels simply head back in the elevator.

Made for LD48 by: @bojoendergame and @apsie17
